description:
Bonus:
Download code for Nintendo Switch Online 7-day trial.
The download code is valid until 03/05/2019, 08:59 BST.

A free Special Demo of Mario Tennis Aces is available to download and play until 08:59am BST, May 3rd, 2019.

When you download the Special Demo, a code for a free 7-day trial of Nintendo Switch Online will be sent to the email address associated with your Nintendo Account. Head on over to the "Redeem code" tab on Nintendo eShop and enter the code to activate it!
name: Mario Tennis Aces: Special Demo
